text: Maxine Kumin (June 6, 1925 - February 6, 2014) was an American poet and author. She became Poet Laureate Consultant in Poetry to the Library of Congress in 1981-1982\. Kumin died on February 6, 2014 in Warner, New Hampshire. She was 88. Her death came after a year of bad health. She had a husband, Victor, and three children. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American poets Category:Disease-related deaths in New Hampshire Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Jewish American writers Category:Writers from Philadelphia Category:Writers from New Hampshire
title: Maxine Kumin
